name: The Miracle Rider
tagline: Texas Ranger tries to stop takeover of Indian lands.

name: Tumbling Tumbleweeds
tagline: After a five year absence Gene returns home to find his father murdered and his boyhood pal accused of the dastardly deed.

name: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie
tagline: A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.

name: Les Boys III
tagline: Three years have passed since the tournament in France and the team formed the Boys always seem great team. When a rich businessman comes in, everything changed.

name: All Access: Front Row. Backstage. Live!
My Summer of Love
tagline: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.

name: RockStar
tagline: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

name: New York
tagline: A taxi-driver is detained on suspicion of being a terrorist.

name: Thr3e
tagline: Innocent lives hang on the whim of an elusive psychopathic murderer whose strange riddles and impossible timelines force three people into a mission to end the game before one or all of them die.

name: Meek's Cutoff
tagline: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.

name: Cassandra's Dream
tagline: The tale of two brothers with serious financial woes. When a third party proposes they turn to crime, things go bad and the two become enemies.

name: Assassination Tango
tagline: An aging hitman gets a contract to kill a general in Buenos Aires. But when his mark becomes unavailable, he becomes involved in Argentinian tango culture.

name: Rampart
tagline: Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.

name: Five Corners
tagline: A psychotic young man returns to his old neighborhood after release from prison. He seeks out the woman he previously tried to rape and the man who protected her, with twisted ideas of love for her and hate for him.

name: Lore
tagline: As the Allies sweep across Germany, Lore leads her siblings on a journey that exposes them to the truth of their parents' beliefs. An encounter with a mysterious refugee forces Lore to rely on a person she has always been taught to hate.

name: To Live and Die in L.A.
tagline: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

name: Yamla Pagla Deewana
tagline: A married Canadian travels to India to re-unite with his estranged father and brother but faces obstacles and challenges.

name: The Beaver
tagline: A troubled husband and executive adopts a beaver hand-puppet as his sole means of communicating.

name: Diary of the Dead
tagline: A group of young film students run into real-life zombies while filming a horror movie of their own.

name: A Man in Love
tagline: An American film-star and an unknown British actress meet on set in Rome. She is angry when he refuses to speak to her journalist father, but later they have a passionate relationship.

name: Timecode
tagline: Four frames of simultaneous action that alternately follow a smitten lesbian lover as she obsesses over her partner's dalliances and the tense goings-on of a Hollywood film production company.

name: More Than a Game
tagline: This documentary follows NBA superstar LeBron James and four of his talented teammates through the trials and tribulations of high school basketball in Ohio and James' journey to fame.

name: Encounters at the End of the World
tagline: Film-maker Werner Herzog travels to the McMurdo Station in Antarctica, looking to capture the continent's beauty and investigate the characters living there.

name: American Teen
tagline: A documentary on seniors at a high school in a small Indiana town and their various cliques.

name: The Taking of Beverly Hills
tagline: A group of embittered ex-cops use a chemical spill to raid the banks and homes of Beverly Hills.

name: Management
tagline: A traveling art saleswoman tries to shake off a flaky motel manager who falls for her and won't leave her alone.

name: Bright Young Things
tagline: An adaptation of Evelyn Waugh's novel "Vile Bodies," is a look into the lives of a young novelist, his would-be lover, and a host of young people who beautified London in the 1930s.

name: Mata Hari
tagline: A semi-fictionalized account of the life of Mata Hari, an exotic dancer who was accused of spying for Germany during World War I.

name: Breaking and Entering
tagline: A landscape architect's dealings with a young thief cause him to re-evaluate his life.

production.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

name: Children of Heaven

production.name: The Institute for the Intellectual Development of Children & Young Adults

tagline: When Ali loses his sister's shoes, the two decide to share his to avoid getting in trouble.

name: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
tagline: In the year 2032, Batô, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

name: Criminal
tagline: Two con artists try to swindle a currency collector by selling him a counterfeit copy of an extremely rare currency bill.

name: Separate Lies
tagline: A couple's marriage is complicated by the introduction of a third party.

name: West of Zanzibar
tagline: A magician seeks vengeance upon the man who paralyzed him and the illegitimate daughter he sired with the magician's wife.

name: Chandni Chowk to China
tagline: An action-comedy about a simple cook from Chandni Chowk mistaken for the reincarnation of an ancient peasant warrior Liu Shengh by residents of an oppressed Chinese village.

name: Finding Vivian Maier
tagline: A documentary on the late Vivian Maier, a nanny whose previously unknown cache of 100,000 photographs earned her a posthumous reputation as one the most accomplished street photographers.

name: Storytelling
tagline: College and high school serve as the backdrop for two stories about dysfunction and personal turmoil.

name: Stuart Saves His Family
tagline: A self-help advocate struggles to put his dysfunctional family in its place.

name: Va Savoir (Who Knows?)
tagline: Quick-witted, well-read cultured types revolve around each other in a delightful potpourri of theatre, romanticism and theft.

name: Sholem Aleichem: Laughing in the Darkness
Cold Souls
tagline: Paul is an actor who feels bogged down by his participation in a production of Chekov's play, Vanya.

name: Starting Out in the Evening
tagline: An ambitious graduate student convinces a writer that her thesis can resurrect his career.

name: Bunty Aur Babli
tagline: Two mismatched characters go on a wild road trip in Uttar Pradesh and, while being dogged by a policeman, fall in love.

name: The War Room
tagline: A documentary of the Bill Clinton 1992 presidential campaign and the organization who ran it.

name: Wallace & Gromit: The Best of Aardman Animation
The Brothers Solomon
tagline: A pair of well-meaning, but socially inept brothers try to find their perfect mates in order to provide their dying father with a grandchild.

name: Heading South
tagline: Three female tourists have their eyes opened while visiting the poverty-stricken and dangerous world of 1980s Haiti.

name: The Glass Menagerie
tagline: A son longs to escape from his stifling home, where his genteel mother worries about the future prospects of his lame, shy sister.

name: First Position
tagline: A documentary that follows six young dancers from around the world as they prepare for the Youth America Grand Prix, one of the most prestigious ballet competitions in the world.

name: The Imposter
tagline: A documentary centered on a young Frenchman who claims to a grieving Texas family that he is their 16-year-old son who has been missing for 3 years.

name: Intermission
tagline: A variety of losers in Dublin have harrowingly farcical intersecting stories of love, greed and violence.

name: Showdown
tagline: A small-town mayor is thrown out by bikers backed by retired mobsters. He calls on his former army buddies to help him clean up the town.

name: Looking for Comedy in the Muslim World
tagline: To improve its relations with Muslim countries, the United States government sends comedian Albert Brooks to south Asia to write a report on what makes followers of Islam laugh.

name: Tyson
tagline: A mixture of original interviews and archival footage and photographs sheds light on the life experiences of Mike Tyson.
